short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen grab/capture the current frame of video elements of websites. Works for video conference calls, too.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Takes a screen grab of the video in the current page of what you are seeing now. For those people who needs to take screenshots of videos for their daily job (like my wife).
